thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Landmark Bancshares To Merge With National Commerce Corporation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Landmark Bancshares To Merge With National Commerce Corporation

organizations.name: brief-landmark bancshares to merge with national commerce corporation

text:
National Commerce Corp:
* LANDMARK BANCSHARES, INC. ENTERS INTO DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO JOIN NATIONAL COMMERCE CORPORATION
* NATIONAL COMMERCE CORP - SUBSEQUENT TO MERGER, FIRST LANDMARK BANK WILL BECOME A PART OF NBC
* NATIONAL COMMERCE CORP - TRANSACTION IS VALUED AT $28.15 PER SHARE OF LANDMARK COMMON STOCK, OR $115.2 MILLION IN AGGREGATE
* NATIONAL COMMERCE CORP - BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF NCC, NBC, LANDMARK AND FIRST LANDMARK BANK HAVE UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED TRANSACTION
* NATIONAL COMMERCE - EACH SHARE OF STOCK OF LANDMARK AT TIME OF DEAL WILL BE CONVERTED INTO RIGHT TO RECEIVE 0.5961 SHARES OF NCC STOCK & $1.33 IN CASH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
